body:
Since last night I have not been able to log on  the forums until now and it said "This website is down" everytime I tried to come on here has that had that problem? And I said stuff that I didint say wtf.....
Staff plz help

title: what the heck is happening to me?!?!?

replies.body: Your account, your responsibility. If something did happen to you. Change your password, archive your recent posts, and possibly get a director to check your IP to see if you have been hacked. I did not experience this problem.
replies.body_tagged: Your account, your responsibility. If something did happen to you. Change your password, archive your recent posts, and possibly get a director to check your IP to see if you have been hacked. I did not experience this problem.
